typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;1,400&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

buttons.primary: bg-[#1E293B] text-white px-8 py-4 rounded-[2px] hover:bg-[#0F172A] transition-colors duration-300 font-medium text-sm tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#E2E8F0] text-[#1E293B] px-8 py-4 rounded-[2px] hover:bg-[#F1F5F9] transition-colors duration-300 font-medium text-sm tracking-wide
buttons.ghost: text-[#475569] hover:text-[#1E293B] transition-colors duration-200 font-medium text-sm

cards.feature: bg-white border border-[#E2E8F0] p-8 rounded-[4px] hover:border-[#94A3B8] transition-colors duration-300
cards.trust: grayscale opacity-60 hover:grayscale-0 hover:opacity-100 transition-all duration-500

inputs.default: bg-white border border-[#E2E8F0] rounded-[2px] px-4 py-3 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#1E293B] focus:border-[#1E293B] outline-none transition-all

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on the background to simulate paper grain.
visual_enhancers.lines: Use 1px solid lines (#E2E8F0) to separate sections instead of background color changes.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons should have a subtle 'press' effect (scale-95). Links should have a custom underline animation.

sections_structure.name: Hero
sections_structure.content: Left: H1 (Serif), Subtext, Dual CTA. Right: Abstract Architectural Image (The 'Structure' metaphor).

sections_structure.name: Trust Strip
sections_structure.content: Logos of top law firms/enterprises. Grayscale, low opacity.

sections_structure.name: The Problem
sections_structure.content: Image: 'Pile of papers' (Chaos). Text: 'Drowning in Documentation'. High contrast.

sections_structure.name: The Approach
sections_structure.content: 1. Ingest, 2. Analyze (AI), 3. Verify (Human). Vertical lines connecting steps.

sections_structure.name: How It Works
sections_structure.content: Interactive cards showing the UI of the app (abstracted).

sections_structure.name: Benefits
sections_structure.content: Speed, Accuracy, Cost, Security. Minimal icons.

sections_structure.name: CTA
sections_structure.content: Large Serif Heading: 'Ready to modernize?'. Primary Button.

universal_guidelines: Do not use drop shadows unless absolutely necessary for depth.
Ensure all text has high contrast (APCA standards).
Use 'Manrope' for UI elements and 'Playfair Display' for storytelling headings.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
